targets.query: SELECT sum("count") AS "OK", mean("mean") AS "Mean", mean("mean")  / ${mean_median} AS "Mean / median(Mean)" FROM "$archive"."gatling" WHERE ("request" = 'allRequests' AND "status" = 'ok' AND "simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "run"

SELECT "Duration" AS "Duration",  "run"
FROM (
SELECT SUM("e") as "Duration" 
FROM
(SELECT elapsed("count", 1s) as "e" FROM "$archive"."gatling" WHERE ("region" =~ /^$region$/ AND "request" = 'allRequests' AND "simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/ AND "userCount" =~ /^$userCount$/ AND "status" = 'all') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "run")
GROUP BY  "run"
)
SELECT min("min") AS "min" FROM "$archive"."gatling" WHERE ("request" = 'allRequests' AND "status" = 'ok' AND "simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "run"

SELECT mean("mean") AS "Mean", mean("mean")  / ${mean_max} AS "Mean / max(Mean)" FROM "$archive"."gatling" WHERE ("request" = 'allRequests' AND "status" = 'ok' AND "simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "run"

SELECT SUM("e") as "Duration" FROM
(SELECT elapsed("count", 1s) as "e" FROM "$archive"."gatling" WHERE ("request" = 'allRequests' AND "simulation" =~ /^$simulation$/ AND "status" = 'all') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "run")
GROUP BY  "run"

SELECT last("d") AS "Duration"
FROM (
    SELECT cumulative_sum(elapsed(last("count"), 1s)) AS "d"
    FROM "$archive"."gatling"
    WHERE "simulation" = '$simulation' AND $timeFilter
    GROUP BY time(1s),  "run"
) 
WHERE $timeFilter
GROUP BY "run"

SELECT last("d") AS "Duration"
FROM (
    SELECT cumulative_sum(elapsed(last("count"), 1s)) AS "d"
    FROM "$archive"."gatling"
    WHERE "simulation" = '$simulation' AND $timeFilter
    GROUP BY time(10s),  "run"
) 
WHERE $timeFilter
GROUP BY "run"

SELECT last("d") AS "Duration"
FROM (
    SELECT cumulative_sum(elapsed(last("count"), 1s)) AS "d"
    FROM "$archive"."gatling"
    WHERE "simulation" = '$simulation' AND $timeFilter
    GROUP BY time(1s),  "run"
) 
WHERE $timeFilter
GROUP BY "run"

panels.title: Test Duration with Finish Time  join  Total

targets.query:
SELECT 
    (last("duration")*2+10) as "Duration" 
FROM
    (SELECT 
         cumulative_sum(elapsed(last("count"), 1s)) as "duration" 
     FROM "$archive"."gatling" 
     WHERE 
         ("simulation" =~ /^${simulation:regex}$/) AND 
          $timeFilter 
     GROUP BY time(1s),  "run"
) 
GROUP BY "run"

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT("simulation") FROM 
  (SELECT last("mean") FROM "$new"."gatling" GROUP BY "simulation"),
  (SELECT last("mean") FROM "$archive"."gatling" GROUP BY "simulation")
WHERE $timeFilter

list.definition:
SELECT max("Mean") FROM (
SELECT mean("mean") as "Mean"
   FROM  "$archive"."gatling"
   WHERE "request" = 'allRequests'
         AND "status" = 'ok'
         AND "simulation" =~ /^${simulation:regex}$/
         AND $timeFilter
   GROUP BY "run"
)

GROUP BY  "run"
